argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lsmcntz.p | |- .(+) = ( LSSum ` G ) |
| 2 |  | lsmcntz.s | |- ( ph -> S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) |
| 3 |  | lsmcntz.t | |- ( ph -> T e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) |
| 4 |  | lsmcntz.u | |- ( ph -> U e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) |
| 5 |  | lsmcntz.z | |- Z = ( Cntz ` G ) |
| 6 |  | #P_subgrcl | |- ( U e. ( SubGrp ` G ) -> G e. Grp ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` G ) = ( Base ` G ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_subgss | |- ( U e. ( SubGrp ` G ) -> U C_ ( Base ` G ) ) |
| 9 | 7, 5 | #P_cntzsubg | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ U C_ ( Base ` G ) ) -> ( Z ` U ) e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) |
| 10 | 6, 8, 9 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( U e. ( SubGrp ` G ) -> ( Z ` U ) e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) |
| 11 | 4, 10 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> ( Z ` U ) e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) |
| 12 | 1 | #P_lsmlub | |- ( ( S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ T e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ ( Z ` U ) e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) -> ( ( S C_ ( Z ` U ) /\ T C_ ( Z ` U ) ) <-> ( S .(+) T ) C_ ( Z ` U ) ) ) |
| 13 | 2, 3, 11, 12 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ph -> ( ( S C_ ( Z ` U ) /\ T C_ ( Z ` U ) ) <-> ( S .(+) T ) C_ ( Z ` U ) ) ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_bicomd | |- ( ph -> ( ( S .(+) T ) C_ ( Z ` U ) <-> ( S C_ ( Z ` U ) /\ T C_ ( Z ` U ) ) ) ) |
